name: NSMetadataQueryAttributeValueTuple
desc: The NSMetadataQueryAttributeValueTuple class represents attribute-value tuples, which are objects that contain the attribute name and value of a metadata attribute.

items.name: var attribute: String
items.desc: The attribute name for the tuple’s value.

items.name: var count: Int
items.desc: The number of instances of the value for the tuple’s attribute.

items.name: var value: Any?
items.desc: The value of the tuple’s attribute.
